Name: Lift
Description: Reduce the weight of an object.

Name: Slam
Description: Knock target Prone with heavy force.

Name: Heavy
Description: You cannot be moved against your will.

Name: Nullify
Description: Stop all momentum in an area.

Name: Hold
Description: Keep a door or object shut.

Name: Trip
Description: Create an obstacle to trip foes.

Name: Absorb
Description: Take damage meant for an ally.

Name: Dodge
Description: Bonus to AC vs one attack.

Name: Sever
Description: Cut off a limb or appendage.
